channel.title: Client Error
channel.description:
@echo off Title Pulsepk Reborn!- By El Goku cd src "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx256m client 66 live live software members english game1 echo Randomscape is loading... java -Xmx256m client 1 live live software members english game1 pause
Using Vista but it'll not work. Got the JRE and JDK.
Got this error
[code]The system cannot find the path specified. Randomscape is loading... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Client Error

item.description:
@Top_Glitch wrote:

@echo off
Title Pulsepk Reborn!- By El Goku
cd src
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx256m client 66 live live software members english game1
echo Randomscape is loading…
java -Xmx256m client 1 live live software members english game1
pause

Using Vista but it’ll not work. Got the JRE and JDK.

Got this error

The system cannot find the path specified. Randomscape is loading... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
